damage_magicka.name: Damage Magicka
damage_magicka.description: Drains the target's Magicka by <mag> points.

damage_magicka_regen.name: Damage Magicka Regen
damage_magicka_regen.description: Decrease the target's Magicka regeneration by <mag>% for <dur> seconds.

damage_stamina.name: Damage Stamina
damage_stamina.description: Drain the target's Stamina by <mag> points.

damage_stamina_regen.name: Damage Stamina Regen
damage_stamina_regen.description: Decrease the target's Stamina regeneration by <mag>% for <dur> seconds.

fear.name: Fear
fear.description: Creatures and people up to level <mag> flee from combat for <dur> seconds.

fortify_alteration.name: Fortify Alteration
fortify_alteration.description: Alteration spells last <mag>% longer for <dur> seconds.

fortify_barter.name: Fortify Barter
fortify_barter.description: You haggle for <mag>% better prices for <dur> seconds.

fortify_block.name: Fortify Block
fortify_block.description: Blocking absorbs <mag>% more damage for <dur> seconds.

fortify_carry_weight.name: Fortify Carry Weight
fortify_carry_weight.description: Carrying capacity increases by <mag> for <dur> seconds.

fortify_conjuration.name: Fortify Conjuration
fortify_conjuration.description: Conjurations spells last <mag>% longer for <dur> seconds.

fortify_destruction.name: Fortify Destruction
fortify_destruction.description: Destruction spells are <mag>% stronger for <dur> seconds.

fortify_enchanting.name: Fortify Enchanting
fortify_enchanting.description: For <dur> seconds, items are enchanted <mag>% stronger.

fortify_health.name: Fortify Health
fortify_health.description: Health is increased by <mag> points for <dur> seconds.

fortify_heavy_armor.name: Fortify Heavy Armor
fortify_heavy_armor.description: Increase Heavy Armor skill by <mag> points for <dur> seconds.

fortify_illusion.name: Fortify Illusion
fortify_illusion.description: Illusion spells are <mag>% stronger for <dur> seconds.

fortify_light_armor.name: Fortify Light Armor
fortify_light_armor.description: Increases Light Armor skill by <mag> points for <dur> seconds.

fortify_magicka.name: Fortify Magicka
fortify_magicka.description: Magicka is increased by <mag> points for <dur> seconds.

fortify_marksman.name: Fortify Marksman
fortify_marksman.description: Bows do <mag>% more damage for <dur> seconds.

fortify_onehanded.name: Fortify One-handed
fortify_onehanded.description: One-handed weapons do <mag>% more damage for <dur> seconds.

fortify_restoration.name: Fortify Restoration
fortify_restoration.description: Restoration spells are <mag>% stronger for <dur> seconds.

fortify_smithing.name: Fortify Smithing
fortify_smithing.description: For <dur> seconds, weapon and armor improving is <mag>% better.

fortify_sneak.name: Fortify Sneak
fortify_sneak.description: You are <mag>% harder to detect for <dur> seconds.

fortify_stamina.name: Fortify Stamina
fortify_stamina.description: Stamina is increased by <mag> points for <dur> seconds.

fortify_twohanded.name: Fortify Two-handed
fortify_twohanded.description: Two-handed weapons do <mag>% more damage for <dur> seconds.

frenzy.name: Frenzy
frenzy.description: Creatures and people up to level <mag> will attack anything nearby for <dur> seconds.

light.name: Light
light.description: Emits a small light that lasts for <dur> seconds.

lingering_damage_health.name: Lingering Damage Health
lingering_damage_health.description: Causes <mag> points of poison damage for <dur> seconds.

lingering_damage_magicka.name: Lingering Damage Magicka
lingering_damage_magicka.description: Drains the target's Magicka by <mag> points per second for <dur> seconds.

lingering_damage_stamina.name: Lingering Damage Stamina
lingering_damage_stamina.description: Drain the target's Stamina by <mag> points per second for <dur> seconds.

ravage_health.name: Ravage Health
ravage_health.description: Causes <mag> points of concentrated poison damage.

ravage_magicka.name: Ravage Magicka
ravage_magicka.description: Concentrated poison damages maximum magicka by <mag> points.

ravage_stamina.name: Ravage Stamina
ravage_stamina.description: Concentrated poison damages maximum stamina by <mag> points.

resist_fire.name: Resist Fire
resist_fire.description: Resist <mag>% of fire damage for <dur> seconds.

resist_frost.name: Resist Frost
resist_frost.description: Resist <mag>% of frost damage for <dur> seconds.

resist_shock.name: Resist Shock
resist_shock.description: Resist <mag>% of shock damage for <dur> seconds.

slow.name: Slow
slow.description: Target moves at 50% speed for <dur> seconds.

spell_absorption.name: Spell Absorption
spell_absorption.description: Absorb <mag>% of the magicka from hostile spells for <dur> seconds.

weakness_to_fire.name: Weakness to Fire
weakness_to_fire.description: Target is <mag>% weaker to fire damage for <dur> seconds.

weakness_to_frost.name: Weakness to Frost
weakness_to_frost.description: Target is <mag>% weaker to frost damage for <dur> seconds.

weakness_to_magic.name: Weakness to Magic
weakness_to_magic.description: Target is <mag>% weaker to magic for <dur> seconds.

weakness_to_poison.name: Weakness to Poison
weakness_to_poison.description: Target is <mag>% weaker to poison for <dur> seconds.

weakness_to_shock.name: Weakness to Shock
weakness_to_shock.description: Target is <mag>% weaker to shock damage for <dur> seconds.
